name: Only Juan in Space
description:
Juan is a surfer astronaut who has decided to take his spacial surfboard and fly to the moon to sit in his folding chair, drink his NRG and chill while enjoying astounding views.

This is a puzzle-platformer game in which there's only one platform that you can freely move with the mouse. This game has been made for GMTK game jam 2019.

Hope you enjoy it!
Authors:

  • Pedro Casas (@peter876
    https://itch.io/profile/peter876)
